snippet: Huntsman moves up in the polls but appears with New Hampshire's primary a day away.
abstract: Huntsman moves up in the polls but appears with New Hampshire's primary a day away.
lead_paragraph: CONCORD, N.H. - Fueled by momentum from his weekend debate performances and rising standing in the polls, Jon M. Huntsman Jr. hustled to independent voter strongholds around New Hampshire on Monday to make the case that he, not Mitt Romney, would be the most formidable Republican challenger to President Obama in November.

headline.main: Huntsman Courts Independents in New Hampshire
